## alpacon cert ls

Display a list of all certificates

### Synopsis


	Retrieves and shows a detailed list of all the SSL/TLS certificates currently managed by the system, 
	including their issuance status and validity.
	

```
alpacon cert ls [flags]
```

### Examples

```

	alpacon cert ls
	alpacon cert list
	alpacon cert all
	
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for ls
```
